com.commercetools.payment.service

Interface PaymentAdapterService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentAdapterServiceImpl

    public interface PaymentAdapterService
    Defines the methods that the shop could call to handle its payment. The shop should never directly call a PaymentServiceProvider implementation. Created by mgatz on 7/18/16.

    • Method Summary

      • createPayment

        java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<PaymentCreationResult> createPayment(CreatePaymentData data)
        Creates a new payment object at the CTP and thereby starts a new payment transaction workflow.
        Parameters:
        data - the wrapper object for all possibly needed data
        Returns:
        CompletionStage of PaymentCreationResult with the result of data payment creation
